## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Tonopah Solar Energy, Llc v. Brahma Grp., Inc.
**판결일**: 2022-09-09
**법원**: Nevada Supreme Court
**관할**: Nevada, NV

IN THE SUPREME COURT OF THE STATE OF NEVADA

vs.

ORDER DISMISSING APPEAL

Pursuant to the stipulation of the parties, and cause appearing,
this appeal is dismissed. The parties shall bear their own costs and attorney
fees. NRAP 42(b).

It is so ORDERED.

CLERK OF THE SUPREME COURT
ELIZABETH A. B tL.
